title: A Scenic harvest from the kingdom of pain
creator_credit: Joe Rees, Jonathan Reiss, IKON (GB) and Target Video
brief_description: Follows the performance art group Survival Research Laboratories and records three performances of the group. The setting up for a performance is shown, and interviews with some of the members of the group are conducted. The video also reports on whether injuries by the audience or performers were sustained.
